backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profile, favorites, and playlist management with access control checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend source files.
frontend/android-wrapper/app/build.gradl: Gradle config for the Android wrapper app including SDK versions and dependencies.
frontend/android-wrapper/app/src/main/An: Android manifest defining permissions, app metadata, and MainActivity entry point.
frontend/android-wrapper/app/src/main/as: Instructions for placing the built web app assets into the Android wrapper.
frontend/android-wrapper/app/src/main/ja: MainActivity that configures a WebView and loads the offline bundled web app from assets.
frontend/android-wrapper/build.gradle: Project-level Gradle configuration and plugin setup for the Android wrapper.
frontend/android-wrapper/README.md: Documentation for the Android WebView wrapper that loads the bundled offline web app.
frontend/android-wrapper/settings.gradle: Gradle settings defining repositories and including the app module.
frontend/BUILD.md: Build guide for producing the offline Android APK version of the app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining color variables and light/dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point referencing the manifest, icons, and main script for the web app.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest specifying app metadata, icons, theme colors, and display mode.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker that caches static assets and audio, cleans old caches, and serves cached responses with fallback to network.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component wiring player, library, header, profile setup, and service worker registration.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGateNot: Displays sign‑in or offline notice when user lacks identity.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button managing Internet Identity auth and query cache reset.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog that collects and saves a user’s display name on first login.
frontend/src/components/header/Header.ts: Header showing app title, install prompt, user name, login button, and offline notice.
frontend/src/components/layout/SectionCa: Simple styled container wrapper for section content.
frontend/src/components/library/LibraryS: Library view managing favorites, playlists, migrations, ordering, and track interactions.
frontend/src/components/library/Playlist: Controls playlist creation, selection, renaming, and deletion via dialogs and menus.
Up/down buttons enabling reordering of playlist tracks.
frontend/src/components/library/TrackRow: Renders a track row with play controls, metadata, favorite and playlist toggles based on props.
frontend/src/components/offline/OfflineN: Displays an alert notifying the user they are offline with limited functionality.
frontend/src/components/player/PlaybackM: Provides shuffle and repeat mode toggle buttons for the audio player.
frontend/src/components/player/PlayerSec: Main player UI with transport controls, seek bar, volume, playback modes, and error handling.
frontend/src/components/pwa/InstallAppEn: Handles PWA install flow with install button and fallback instructions dialog.
frontend/src/config/canisterResolution.t: Selects backend canister host and ID based on environment, with fallbacks for production and local.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, invalidating queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAudioPlayer.ts: Implements full audio player logic including playback, track loading, progress, volume, shuffle, and repeat.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and logic for Internet Identity authentication, login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useNetworkStatus.ts: Tracks online/offline network status using browser events.
frontend/src/hooks/usePwaInstall.ts: Provides a hook to detect PWA install availability, track installation state, and trigger the install prompt.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for loading and saving user profile, favorites, and playlists via an actor with offline checks.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind base styles and custom Nothing-style color variables plus utility backgrounds.
frontend/src/lib/tracks.ts: Defines track types, sample track data, and helpers for lookup and time formatting.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, animations, and plugins for the app's design system.
project_state.json: Contains project metadata, features, known issues, and architectural notes for the music player app.
